trial.status: You are currently on Trial plan

people.title: People
people.description: Manage your contacts, add new people to your network, and organize them with tags. This section gives you a comprehensive view of all individuals connected to your business.

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.description: Create and manage automated workflows to streamline your business processes. Set up triggers, actions, and conditions to automate repetitive tasks and save time.

apps.title: Apps
apps.description: Browse and manage the applications integrated with your account. Connect with third-party services and extend functionality through our app marketplace.

aiAgents.title: AI Agents
aiAgents.description: Deploy intelligent AI agents to handle specific tasks automatically. Train custom models and create agents that can engage with your customers or process data without human intervention.

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.description: Plan, create, and track marketing campaigns across multiple channels. Monitor performance metrics and optimize your outreach efforts to maximize ROI.

fallback.title: {selectedSection}
fallback.description: Content for {selectedSection} will be displayed here.

common.keyFeaturesText: This section provides tools and features to help you manage your {contentTitle} effectively. You can add, edit, delete, and organize items according to your business needs.
common.gettingStartedText: To get started with {contentTitle}, explore the options available in this section. You can use the buttons above to create new items or use the search and filter options to find specific entries.
